actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Practice&Procedure.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Administrative Practice and Procedure

official_title: A bill for the relief of Henry W. Lerch of Maryland and Harold J. Nussbaum, Dolores Murray, and Edward C. Kennelly of the District of Columbia.

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to four named individuals in full satisfaction of all claims for unpaid judgment awards to such individuals for legal services in Philippine widows veterans' benefits cases litigated between 1965 and 1972.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Henry W. Lerch of Maryland and Harold J. Nussbaum, Dolores Murray, and Edward C. Kennelly of the District of Columbia.
